## ManipulationNode.appendBefore() method

It usually append a node successfully, but it isn't possible to append a node in front of root node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
appendBefore(node: NodeProp<T>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | [NodeProp](./treex-js.nodeprop.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | node to append in front of itself |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

if a node is appended successfully, return true, otherwise return false
